channel.title: Tillmann on Tillmann Mühlpfordt
channel.description: Recent content in Tillmann on Tillmann Mühlpfordt

item.title: First blood
item.description:
Hi there, this is my first post. Hence, it comes with the usual clumsy attitude of firsts: you don’t really know how to behave accordingly.

So I’ll jump into specificity, and provide the event for creating this site: the event triggering this site is that my son has grown fond of chess.

Okay?

And that, in turn, intrigued me to do some research about the rabbit hole that calls itself chess programming. I thought, why not start some little side project that deploys some chess-related application on a k8s cluster, or so.

item.title: About
item.description:
tl; dr Link to heading

Hi, I am Tillmann, and I am in my mid-thirties. I live a happy life in the middle of Germany. Most likely, you’ll find me reading a book, riding my bike, fancying music (drums, piano, choir), hanging out with lovely people (which applies to my kids in the usual 80-fashion), cooking, or so. If not, then I’m probably working.

Or writing content for this site, maybe.
